lines.text: Maybe he didn't do it to himself at all!
Maybe the <c=#FF6000>Go Wizard</c> wanted to get rid of a witness!
So he grabbed the guy by the neck, dunked him in the tub, and drowned him in concrete!
Then the fiend took his victim's corpse, and posed it in the middle of the room as a monument to his sin!
...And then poked breathin' holes in the beard so he could still breathe.
